summary: This release adds Weave, a system for connecting content across your site, and Porch for support tickets. I fixed a bunch of accessibility warnings and sidebar bugs, and migrated a lot of the UI to Svelte 5 for better performance. There's also a new domain blocklist to keep things safe and a redesigned plans page.
